Explain scope, sources, definitions, and caveats
content_outline: U.S.-based VC firms only; excludes multi-strategy buyout platforms unless dedicated VC/growth franchises
AUM expressed as ranges with source/date notes; to be refreshed with SEC ADV when available
Sources: firm disclosures, reputable media, investor materials; cross-verified where possible
Contact: best available email or contact form

style_instruction.layout_description: Use a title slide with a bold background image. Content slides use two-column layouts and grid lists for ranked items; closing slide centers content.
